name: points Must Be Covered By Line Point
description: In this rule the points in one layer must be covered by the lines in another layer,
so points errors are created on the points that are not covered by lines. For example,
this rule is useful when is needed model points that are coincident with lines
like as when there are falls along with a set of lines, such as highway signs along highways.

DeletePoint.name: Delete Point
description: This action delete the point errors. Points of the input layer that are not covered by the line must be deleted.
Delete Point action, delete the entities that do not comply the rule
